allow: Bash(GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:4,pylon:4 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=10 ! video/x-raw,width=640,height=480 ! fakesink sync=false)
Bash(GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:4 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=2 ! fakesink)
Bash(GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:5,pylon:5 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=1 ! fakesink)
Bash(GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:4,pylon:4 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=2 ! video/x-raw,format=RGB ! fakesink)
Bash(GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:6,pylon:6 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=1 ! video/x-raw,format=RGB,width=640,height=480 ! fakesink)
Bash(GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:4 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=2 ! video/x-raw,format=GRAY8,width=640,height=480 ! fakesink)
Bash(GST_PLUGIN_PATH=builddir/ext/pylon GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:4,hdrmeta:4 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=10 ! fakesink silent=false -v)
Bash(GST_PLUGIN_PATH=/mnt/d/source/gst-plugin-pylon/builddir/ext/pylon GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:4 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=10 ! fakesink silent=false -v)
Bash(GST_DEBUG=pylonsrc:4 gst-launch-1.0 pylonsrc hdr-sequence="19,150" num-buffers=10 ! fakesink silent=false -v)
